## Checklist

Before submitting, confirm each of the following:

- [ ] My plugin only imports from documented Plugin API paths (`@/lib/supabase/`, `@/lib/types`, `@/lib/constants`, `@/components/BaseMap`)
- [ ] My plugin does not modify any core platform files
- [ ] My plugin's README includes: what it does, database changes, imports from core, installation steps, routes, known limitations
- [ ] My database migrations are numbered sequentially and have been tested on a fresh Supabase project
- [ ] `npm run build` passes with my plugin installed
- [ ] I have tested that existing ParkLife functionality is unaffected
- [ ] I commit to maintaining this plugin or will open an issue here if I can no longer do so

## What does your plugin do?

*One paragraph, plain language.*

## Does it add or modify any database tables?

*List tables and columns, or write "No database changes".*
